text: Le Bossu (French for "The Hunchback") may refer to: * René Le Bossu (1631–1680), French critic * Le Bossu (novel), a French historical adventure novel by Paul Féval * Le Bossu (1944 film) * Le Bossu (1959 film), a film directed by André Hunebelle, starring Jean Marais and Bourvil * Le Bossu (1997 film), a film directed by Philippe de Broca, starring Daniel Auteuil and Fabrice Luchini * Adam de la Halle (1237–1288), also known as Adam le Bossu * Robert de Beaumont, 2nd Earl of Leicester (1104–1168), also known as Robert le Bossu * Le Bossu, a secondary supervillain in the Batman R.I.P. storyline ==See also== * Hunchback (disambiguation) * Bertrand Bossu (born 1980), French footballer * Jean Bernard Bossu (1720-1792), French officer and explorer
title: Le Bossu
